t: Damaged or Defective Item - Amazon Customer Service
s: The time window for initiating a replacement is the same as the return window for that product category. For example, if the product has a return window of 30 days, a replacement will also have to be initiated within the same period of 30 days.

If you need to return or replace an item, visit Your Orders and select 'Return or Replace Items' on the relevant order. You can find help topics on this page such as how to replace broken and missing items, returning your order, and how to resolve refund issues.
